channel.title: How could I edit a 508 server?
channel.description:
I downloaded a 508 server and it's much different then the normal one's :s... i can't find any Client.java
, and also, there is no Compile button.
Please help me :|
And how could i edit the server then?
Greetz, tha hartpaint TEAM ;D

item.title: How could I edit a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Yeah, I’m trying not to flame.

Anyways, 508’s are much more complicated. All you need to edit is in the /src/ folder, so play around in the files. The compiler is under /cmd/

Read full topic
item.source: How could I edit a 508 server?

the all.batch in the cmd folder is the compiler i geuss?

item.title: How could I edit a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme2 trytohaxme2
item.description:
@trytohaxme2 wrote:

508 servers are much more advanced then a 317, none of the files are named the same.
If their is no compiler you can always make one.

Read full topic
